title: Frontend Web Developer
description: Developing new features and tools for our web application
Building reusable code or components for future use
Collaborating with backend developers and UI/UX designers to improve usability
Getting feedback from PM & users and build solutions for them

title: Project Software Engineer
description: Preparing, scheduling, coordinating, and monitoring assigned projects/websites
Communicating with customers and making sure the customer’s expectations are met
Using Babylon.js or Unity to build a 3D web application
Ensure high quality graphic standards and brand consistency
Write functional requirement documents and guides

title: Full-stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: Learned Frontend languages HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Learned Backend languages C# and SQL
Collaborating with teammates to build a web application at the end of the course

title: Customer Service Representatives
description: Serve customers from around the world using Live Chat to communicate with them instantly and also via email
Taking several chats at a time
Have general knowledge of 3C product and computer hardware to resolve customers’ issues
Handle various situations including marketing/promotions, payment, shipping, RMAs, post-sale service, etc.
